Blog.post: ::Sigh:: Aspire for a dream one at a time, Patrick. So, yeah...let's see...we could meet on that chat.armkids.com place. Or AIM. I prefer AIM because a lot of times the armchat will freeze. So... How about tomorrow (June 22) at 4:00? And have you talked to Alex about his element? There're now 5 elements he can choose from: 1)Water 2)Lightning 3)Space 4)Metal 5) Earth Muahaha... but you probably wouldn't want me to tell you other things about the elements...at least...yet... ::Evil cackle:: You can't paint the red door black... Uh? Alter egos? Hehe. That was mine. Have you heard of an Operating system (OS) that has an acronym that spells LAME? It's quite funny. My sister was online searching for stuff on Google and found that interesting tidbit. ...Sorry if I inconvenienced anyone with that information. I'll just sit in my corner and draw some more pretty pictures...

i dunno just call me or something and we'll have a meeting. we can do it on aim or that one place... umm... what is is, like arm chat or something? i dunno just tell me the name of the site and yeah.... damnit nick and theron were right, those girls stole our pop. and they were beezatches [me and theron's word]. and they weren't really that hot. the tennis camp girls were much better... we were allowed to party with them in the lounge. *wink wink* umm... i think that there should just be wind cuz i was really bored and i just watched some enviromental shit show that was animated and there was some blue guy. there's no air. there's only wind. so i'm gonna stand by that reasoning. post me back . [EL DORADO]

Wee. Now I may as well be considered bald. lol. New haircut. Patrick, when do you guys go to the computers? What hours? I want to organize a meeting, if you guys can take time from your busy schedule to do so. And trying to party with the girls by offering them Mountain Dew.

At least it sounds like you and Alex are having fun. Me? Mom's gonna sign me up for a drama camp. Sucks ass. But at least I don't have to go to the church camp *shudders* That water looks pretty holy to me...*screams* Metal, earth, or wood? your choice. Of course, the other five have been registered already in my one group. ...Making another group...? Metal, earth, wood, air, water, lightning, or space. I'm keeping my flame. Muahaha. And, also, how the hell are you posting? Do you have a computer in your dorm or something? That would be sweet if you did...

alrighty, i'm at peaks and takin all my classes now. there's this one girl who likes alex. i opened her panti droor (sp?)for alex to look in. her room mate shut it really fast and told the girl (katt [annamarie]). and i'm proud to tell you that she tried to kick me in the balls (avoided by a swift move of the legs) and then i recieved a slap in the face. it's so funny how when if you really piss a girl off,they slap you and expect it to hurt. but katie will shinkick you... btw katie, where were you last night? [EL DORADO]

hey if anyone wants to join the members team so you can post stuff and create your own little forumey thing. just tell us in a comment or email. and yes, we do see you sitting there bedazzled sucking your thumbs at our incredible knowledge. bow down and worship our mightiness!!! [EL DORADO]

hey if anyone wants to join the members team so you can post stuff and create your own little forumey thing. just tell us in a comment or email. and yes, we do see you sitting there bedazzled sucking your thumbs at our incredible knowledge. bow down and worship our mightiness!!! [EL DORADO]
Someone is having troubles with his blog... That sucks. Aurea Duca helped me with my blog, so there. You all can go to Hell.
I guess I'm an admin now. And the more power to me. Wee. Now don't piss me off.

well, i think katie was right and it is the 10th. well shit. i was wrong. i wanna go to borders. alex 'n katie, call me about plans. i'm gonna be gone all next week at camp katie. we might call you if we need to. i think i'm gonna be taking a phone card. hey this'll be fun. i'll call everyone anonymously with my phone card! Shaun, i will call you long distance. and use up minutes. mwahahahhaha. alright, i think i'm done posting for today. later, i'm out. go to hell.

i am so bored. thanks to katie i have this *blog*. very fun. well, i have been up to some morrowind. i turned into a werewolf. i have this theory... perhaps, if you want a song i have, you can tell me. and i will email it to you. this is just a theory but hopefully i can get it started. well, that's all for today. see you in hell.

::Sigh:: I think we're all going through that stage right now. And hot damn, how I'd love to kill it. Too bad it can't be shot in the face with a .45. Gibbies! Much fun at camp. Heh heh. Fun. Right. Yech. It was based around the 50s, and so was our ending performance. The only thing that was fun was stealing from--wait, that reminds me. The only thing that was fun was taking a sip of the wine that the counselors supposedly "hid" on top of the fridge. And yes, Pinio Grigio is kinda nasty. Argh. I can't seem to get into Elfwood...you have to pass a test to get in... Elfwood is where you can post stories (like fanfiction, only more formal) and pictures alike. It WOULD be fun...the bastards.

so it looks like people haven't been posting much... well it's cool that a total stranger viewed my site.alas, i still want more then a blog... my brother is at camp now. and he also says he doesn't remember that html shit... and i don't want nick to come over and just have me go to that one chicken site to learn html... [shudders] and i now i must say that i got a ton of welts paintballing... those other guys we played were good. and katie, ask laura if i can have a site branched off hers. [EL DORADO]
